Text:
Serb title : Crna macka, beli macor
English title : Black Cat, White Cat
French title : Chat noir, chat blanc 
IMDB : http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118843/
Genre : Comedy / Romance
Prod. year : 1998

Video : 720x400 (16:9), AutoGK 2.40
Audio : Original DVDrip (.mp3, 192kbps 2ch AC3)

Subtitles (External file) : English

Either I am a moron, or this is not a file that you want to download. The DVD opening screen plays as an .avi, but the actual movie does not open. Windows claims it to be an invalid file name. I don't know how it is invalid, but it is.
I can't get it to play either. I can onlt play the "sample" file but the movie won't play. Some help/explanation would be appreciated...
It is not the movie. It is just some irrelevant music.
